languages.text: Each use of {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g} on the same target reduces that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} by −10%. Stacks.
languages.original_text: Каждое применение Поиска слабого места к той же цели уменьшает ее {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}уклонение{/g} и {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}снижение уклонения{/g} на 10%. Эффект суммируется.

traits.locale_text: Each use of Aim for the Opening on the same target reduces that target's dodge and dodge reduction by -10%. Stacks.

languages.text: 每次对同一目标使用{g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}瞄准破绽{/g}时，都会使该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}降低10%。此效果可叠加。
languages.original_text: Each use of {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g} on the same target reduces that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} by −10%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: 每次对同一目标使用瞄准破绽时，都会使该目标的{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}闪避{/g}与{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}闪避减免{/g}降低10%。此效果可叠加。

languages.text: Cada uso de {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Apuntar al hueco{/g} contra un mismo objetivo reduce en un −10 % sus puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.
languages.original_text: Each use of {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g} on the same target reduces that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} by −10%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Cada uso de Apuntar al hueco contra un mismo objetivo reduce en un −10 % sus puntuaciones de {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquiva{/g} y {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}reducción de esquiva{/g}. Este efecto es acumulativo.

languages.text: Jeder Einsatz von {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Blöße ausnutzen{/g} auf dasselbe Ziel reduziert dessen {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} um −10 %. Wird aufaddiert.
languages.original_text: Each use of {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g} on the same target reduces that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} by −10%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Jeder Einsatz von Blöße ausnutzen auf dasselbe Ziel reduziert dessen {g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}Ausweichen{/g} und {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}Ausweichreduzierung{/g} um −10%. Wird aufaddiert.

languages.text: Chaque utilisation de {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Viser la brèche{/g} sur la même cible entraîne une diminution de −10 % de l'{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}esquive{/g} et de la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de cette cible. Cumulable.
languages.original_text: Each use of {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Aim for the Opening{/g} on the same target reduces that target's {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}dodge{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}dodge reduction{/g} by −10%. Stacks.

traits.locale_text: Chaque utilisation de Viser la Brèche sur la même cible entraîne une diminution de -10 % de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Dodge}esquive{/g} et de la {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}réduction d'esquive{/g} de cette cible. Cumulable.

languages.text: 同じターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}狙いを使用するたびに、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}が−10%減少する。この効果はスタックする。

traits.locale_text: 同じターゲットに{g|Encyclopedia:Opening}隙{/g}狙いを使用するたびに、そのターゲットの{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}回避{/g}と{g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}回避減少{/g}が−10%減少する。この効果はスタックする。

languages.text: {g|f:e2af8c0124f94ca5b9a8b3f91982908a}Açıklığı Hedefle{/g} kabiliyetinin aynı hedef üzerinde her kullanımı, hedefin {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeGlossary}kaçınma{/g} ve {g|Encyclopedia:DodgeReduction}kaçınma azaltımı{/g} değerlerini %10 azaltır. Etki üst üste birikebilir.
